mapper.select: SELECT USERID, NICKNAME, INSTA, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS RDATE, CASE RANKS WHEN '1' THEN '일반회원' END AS RANKS, CASE AUTH WHEN 'N' THEN '일반회원' WHEN 'Y' THEN '관리자' WHEN 'M' THEN '최상위 관리자' END AS AUTH FROM USERINFO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.UNQ, P.ADDR, P.PLACENAME, P.PHOTOPATH, P.EXPLAIN, P.SOURCE, TO_CHAR(P.APPDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS APPDATE, U.NICKNAME FROM PLACE P, USERINFO U WHERE P.STATE = 'N' AND P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.USERID = U.USERID
SELECT CAFEID, CAFENAME, INSTA, ADDR, TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RDATE, STATE FROM CAFEINFO WHERE STATE = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
